Text.Value: What brought you to this place?
Oblivion? Why would you want that?
*The corpse remains silent. It does not know.*

EditorData.logicalname: DOESN'T KNOW ANSWER - DELETE IF NOT NEEDED

Text.Value: How did you become a Dark Justiciar?
*The corpse remains silent. It does not know.*
Raphael hired the orthon to kill you - why would he then help you?
How did you become a swarm of rats?
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
*The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

Synopsis:
The player turned the Last Justiciar back into a humanoid by killing his rats. The player then proceeded to kill the Last Justiciar and talk to him using Speak With Dead.

The Last Justiciar witnessed the Orthon attack and has been using his rat form to hide for years
